active-color.description: Selected colors for menu titles and options
active-color.description_zh: 菜单标题和选项的选中态颜色

direction.description: The menu expands in the direction and the optional value is up
direction.description_zh: 菜单展开方向，可选值为up

duration.description: Animation duration, in seconds, is set to 0 to disable animation
duration.description_zh: 动画时长，单位秒，设置为 0 可以禁用动画

overlay.description: Whether or not to display the mask layer

close-on-click-overlay.description: Whether to close the menu after clicking on the mask layer
close-on-click-overlay.description_zh: 是否在点击遮罩层后关闭菜单

close-on-click-outside.description: Whether or not to close the menu after clicking on an external element
close-on-click-outside.description_zh: 是否在点击外部元素后关闭菜单

methods.name: close
methods.description: Turn off the display status of all menus
methods.description_zh: 关闭所有菜单的展示状态
